short_summary: Request for Proposal for Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT This requirement is for the Department of National Defence (DND) for the services of One (1) Senior Technician under Stream 5, Technical, Engineering and Maintenance Services. The intent of this solicitation is to establish one (1) Contract for two (2) initial years, with the option to extend the term of the Contract by up to three (3) one-year irrevocable option periods under the same conditions. ",
